sentences: Croatian Proposal on LULUCF: On the proposal by Croatia to consider its forest management activities under Protocol Article 3.4 (additional activities), Chair Estrada noted that consultations on a related Croatian proposal on changing its base-year emissions were being undertaken by SBSTA.
He said it was agreed that both issues would be resolved concurrently, and that the proposals would be addressed at SB-17.

The EU noted that the discounted forest management value proposed by Croatia exceeds the value provided by the FAO, and said the matter should be forwarded to SBSTA for consideration once the question of the base-year emissions has been resolved.

CROATIA said it did not consider it necessary for SBSTA to address this issue given that a technical review had already been carried out, and agreed with Chair Estradas suggestion to take up both its issues simultaneously.
enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
